name: Cybercube (itch)
description:
It's my first "game", so if its bad, its totally normal.

The strange physics is normal, its because I found that's funny.

By : Rem7717

If you want to look at the credit, look at README.txt

If the Itch.io launcher put an error at launch, please click on open in file manager!

- Windows : extract the zip file, and launch Cybercube.exe

- MacOSX / Linux : Install love2d, and execute ./love Cybercube.love 

System requirements:

- Windows 7, 8 or 10  (32 bits or 64 bits)

- MacOSX or Linux, using Love2D
